data.description:
Training to become an elite baseball/softball player is a tedious task that involves a great deal of repetitive training.  Imagine having the ability to train when you want, where you want and how you want.  Lifelike repetitive ground balls and pop ups tailored specifically to your needs without ever leaving your room.  Well you don't have to imagine any longer, Fielder's ChoiceVR is your solution.
Fielder's ChoiceVR is a virtual reality baseball/softball fielding training application that allows players to design personalized practice/workouts plans.  There are numerous workout plan options. Players can use the standard preloaded options, customize personal training or use the random option and let the application control the plan. 
Fielder's ChoiceVR is an effective, yet fun way to improve your fielding skills in a safe manner.  All skill levels can benefit from Fielder's ChoiceVR's abililty to provide repetitive training for fielding simulations.  Players can choose to workout with a baseball or a softball, they can select their favorite glove, and they can also choose their training facility (grass field or stadium).

changelog.change_log: Removed subscription requirement and login functionality.
Demo version added.  Added the ability to track the completed workouts.  Added the ability to view the current workout ball details on the screen.
